General.Name: Poly Real Estate Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Poly Developments and Holdings Group Co., Ltd. develops, invests in, operates, and manages real estate properties in China and internationally. The company develops and rents office buildings, exhibition halls, stadiums, shopping centers, hotels, pavilion, and apartment. It also engages in the agency, business and global management, and real estate finance businesses; exhibition services and venue rental business; golf course management; and provision of engineering design, supervision, and consulting services. Poly Developments and Holdings Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
